pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū navakammaṃ karontā rukkhaṃ chindantipi chedāpentipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.4: Tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.5: “mā, bhante, attano bhavanaṃ kattukāmo mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ chindī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.6: So bhikkhu anādiyanto chindiyeva, tassā ca devatāya dārakassa bāhuṃ ākoṭesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.10: “na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ yāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ idheva jīvitā voropeyyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.12: Atha kho sā devatā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.14: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, devate, taṃ bhikkhuṃ jīvitā na voropesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.15: Sacajja tvaṃ, devate, taṃ bhikkhuṃ jīvitā voropeyyāsi, bahuñca tvaṃ, devate, apuññaṃ pasaveyyāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.16: Gaccha tvaṃ, devate, amukasmiṃ okāse rukkho vivitto tasmiṃ upagacchā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.18: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā rukkhaṃ chindissantipi chedāpessantipi ekindriyaṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jīvaṃ viheṭhentī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.19: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.20: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.21: “kathañhi nāma āḷavakā bhikkhū rukkhaṃ chindissantipi chedāpessantipī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.22: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, rukkhaṃ chindathāpi chedāpethāpī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.25: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, rukkhaṃ chindissathāpi, chedāpessathāpi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:1.28: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.1.2: pañca bījajātāni— mūlabījaṃ, khandhabījaṃ, phaḷubījaṃ, aggabījaṃ, bījabījameva pañcamaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.1.4: haliddi, siṅgiveraṃ, vacā, vacattaṃ, ativisā, kaṭukarohiṇī, usīraṃ, bhaddamuttakaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyanti, mūle sañjāyanti, etaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.1.6: assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako, kapitthano, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi khandhe jāyanti, khandhe sañjāyanti, etaṃ khandhabījaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.1.8: ucchu, veḷu, naḷo, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi pabbe jāyanti, pabbe sañjāyanti, etaṃ phaḷubījaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.1.10: ajjukaṃ, phaṇijjakaṃ, hiriveraṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi agge jāyanti, agge sañjāyanti, etaṃ aggabījaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.1.12: pubbaṇṇaṃ, aparaṇṇaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi bīje jāyanti, bīje sañjāyanti, etaṃ bījabījaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.2.1: Bīje bījasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, pacati vā pacāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.2.2: Bīje vematiko chindati vā chedāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, pacati vā pacāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.2.3: Bīje abījasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vā, bhindati vā bhedāpeti vā, pacati vā pacāpeti vā, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc11:2.3.2: “imaṃ jāna, imaṃ dehi, imaṃ āhara, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti bhaṇati,
